name: 1bit plus shooter
description:
1bit plus shooter is 2D horizontal shooter game.

It’s almost monochrome shooting game.To make the game more transparent, additional colors have been added (enemy shots and background).

Game details:
- 18 supreme beautiful levels
- 3 difficulty levels
- Many enemies and bosses
- Fast action
- Plane upgrades
- Amazing explosion effects
- Many particles
- Simple controls
- Satisfy hardcore gamers and casual players
